title: Athletism — Skiing (Elite) — Phase 2: Work Capacity & Chassis
equipment: Gym: squat rack, platforms, barbells, dumbbells, cables
Stationary bike/Wattbike, treadmill (incline), curved sprint track
goal: Enhance aerobic base and trunk endurance for repeatability of ski runs.

warmup: Activation 8–10' (glute med, deep core, scapular control)
Landing mechanics: snap-downs, pogos, lateral snap-downs
main: Strength (accumulation): Front Squat 5x5 @RPE7, Hip Thrust 4x8, Bench Pull 4x8
Circuit EMOM (20–24'): sled push 20m / box step-downs 8/leg / bear crawl 15m
Trunk endurance: Copenhagen plank 3x30–45''/side, dead bug 3x12

notes: Week 1: Tempo circuits (EMOM 20'). Week 2: EMOM 24' + COD drills low‑impact.
